title: Bagels and Beans - Raadhuisstraat
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Fast food, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Dutch-owned chain of lunchrooms Bagels & Beans offers a menu inspired not by American-style bagles but the tastes and herbs of Europe and Southern France. Offers vegetarian and vegan bagels, sweets, coffee, and fresh juices. Could replace cream cheese with hummus for some items.
